original_title: Mandarina Colombo signs as hospitality partner for South Asian Travel Awards 2023
original_body_lines: South Asian Travel Awards (SATA) has announced Mandarina Colombo as the official Hospitality Partner Hotel for the Sri Lanka Jury Evaluation Sessions. This esteemed partnership will provide distinguished jury members with exceptional accommodation and services as they travel across Sri Lanka to evaluate and identify the winners of the South Asian Travel Awards.

SATA is an annual event that recognises and celebrates excellence in the travel and tourism industry across South Asia. The Sri Lanka Jury Evaluation Sessions hold significant importance in the evaluation process, playing a crucial role in determining the deserving winners in various categories.

Mandarina Colombo, renowned for its contemporary elegance and exceptional hospitality, has been selected as the Hospitality Partner Hotel for the Sri Lanka Jury Evaluation Sessions. Situated in the heart of Colombo.

“We are delighted to have Mandarina Colombo as our Hospitality Partner for the Sri Lanka Jury Evaluation Sessions,” said SATA Vice President Suraj Khan. “With its modern sophistication, luxurious accommodations, and impeccable service, Mandarina Colombo perfectly aligns with the spirit of the South Asian Travel Awards. We are confident that the jury members will have a remarkable stay at this exceptional property and appreciate the hotel’s commitment to excellence,” he added.

Mandarina Colombo is a luxurious hotel located in Colombo, Sri Lanka. With its contemporary design, world-class amenities, and personalised service, the hotel offers a sophisticated experience to its guests. The hotel features spacious and stylishly appointed rooms, a range of dining options highlighting international and local flavours, a rooftop bar with breath-taking views, versatile event spaces for conferences, and other special occasions.

The South Asian Travel Awards (SATA) has been recognising the best of South Asia’s hospitality and travel industry since 2016. The prestigious annual event honours stellar organisations and individuals in a wide array of categories.
